content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: brick_wall
inventory=[{"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 64, "index": 14}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 44, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 53, "index": 29}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 6, "index": 32}, {"type": "iron_bars", "quantity": 35, "index": 44}]
thought: I need to craft bricks into brick walls. Bricks are found in slot 32, so I will move one to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brick_wall
inventory=[{"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 64, "index": 14}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 44, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 53, "index": 29}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 5, "index": 32}, {"type": "iron_bars", "quantity": 35, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed one brick in the crafting grid, but I still need two more to form a column. I will place another brick in slot 2, which is directly below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brick_wall
inventory=[{"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 64, "index": 14}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 44, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 53, "index": 29}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 4, "index": 32}, {"type": "iron_bars", "quantity": 35, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed two bricks in the crafting grid, but I still need one more to form a column. I will place another brick in slot 3, which is directly below slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brick_wall
inventory=[{"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 64, "index": 14}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 44, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 53, "index": 29}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 3, "index": 32}, {"type": "iron_bars", "quantity": 35, "index": 44}]

thought: I have formed a column of bricks in the crafting grid, but I still need two more columns to form a full 3x3 crafting grid. I will place another brick in slot 4, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brick_wall
inventory=[{"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 64, "index": 14}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 44, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 53, "index": 29}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "iron_bars", "quantity": 35, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed one brick in the second column of the crafting grid, but I still need two more to form a full column. I will place another brick in slot 5, which is directly below slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brick_wall
inventory=[{"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 64, "index": 14}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 44, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 53, "index": 29}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "iron_bars", "quantity": 35, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed two bricks in the second column of the crafting grid, but I still need one more to form a full column. I will place another brick in slot 6, which is directly below slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 6 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brick_wall
inventory=[{"type": "brick_wall", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 64, "index": 14}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 44, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 53, "index": 29}, {"type": "iron_bars", "quantity": 35, "index": 44}]
thought: I have formed a full 3x3 crafting grid of bricks in the crafting grid, so I can now craft the brick walls. I will move the brick walls from the crafting slot (0) to an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
